casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donna Helms LEDBETTER. No. 402P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 17, 2015. Meghan Adelle Jones, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Ledbetter, Donna Helms. Ashleigh P. Dunston, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of December 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of December 2015."
